```{r}
dna <- read.dna("/Users/henrysun_1/Desktop/Duke/PhD 2025-2026/callinectes_co1/processed/combined_CO1_trimmed.fasta", format = "fasta")

# Build haplotype network
haps <- haplotype(dna)
net <- haploNet(haps)

# Plot with smaller text and node labels
plot(
  net,
  size = attr(net, "freq"), # circle size by haplotype frequency
  scale.ratio = 0.2, # edge-to-node scaling
  cex = 0.4, #text size
  labels = TRUE # show haplotype labels
)


```
